Title: Poison Ivy: The New Seduction
Actors: Jaime Pressly, Megan Edwards, Michael Des Barres, Greg Vaughan
Plot: Ivy's sister, Violet, comes to visit the Greer residence in this third installment of the franchise. It does not take long for the family to be turned upside down as Violet uses her body and skills of manipulation to throw the household into a state of panic and deceit.
